common.pageDescription: Retiring credits enables you to achieve your emission reduction goals and attain carbon neutrality.

info: Your wallet's balance depends on settled amounts. Settlement cycles are conducted daily at the end of the CET business day (GMT+1).
Are independent of trading activity and can be utilized at any time.
form.assetInfo: The list will only display assets that have a balance.
form.poolTokenInfoBold: When the pool token is selected,
form.poolTokenInfo: a credit to be retired will be randomly chosen from the pool during the retirement process.

selectedAssets.title: Summary
selectedAssets.placeholderText: Add credits to the retire list
selectedAssets.summaryDescriptionBold: You will receive the necessary documentation before audit season.
selectedAssets.summaryDescription: Contact support if you have any questions or need further assistance.

backdrops.retireCreditsDescription: Please complete the following information to retire credits.
backdrops.infoPopoverContent: Green-E audits are often required for public companies making consumer or investor facing environmental claims.
backdrops.loadingHintBold: Retirement may take up to 1 min.
backdrops.loadingHint: Please wait until the process is completed.
backdrops.successSubtitle: Your balances are now updated. Please note that there might be delays in reflecting transactions in your transaction history.
